Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128

KafkaConnectVersion.description: The version of Kafka Connect. It has to be compatible with both the Kafka cluster's version and the plugins.
KafkaConnectVersion.markdownDescription:
The version of Kafka Connect. It has to be compatible with both the Kafka cluster's version and the plugins.

Update requires: Replacement

Plugins.markdownDescription:
List of plugins to use with the connector.

Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

ServiceExecutionRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role used by the connector to access Amazon S3 objects and other external resources.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):iam:.*  
Update requires: Replacement
